The Science of
Working Smarter

We help companies become innovative learning organizations where teams collaborate better, solve problems faster, and stay engaged longer.

Learn How

Corporate

Unleash the power of teams and innovation through designed learning experiences based on data and behavioral insights.

Did you know? One company increased innovation by 7% with a 10% increase in exploration.

Law

Sharpen successful collaboration, negotiation, and problem solving capabilities…and accelerate value to the firm.

Did you know? One law firm writes off over $120k of annual billable hours per new Associate.

Higher Ed

Launch students into successful careers with critical skills through smart learning scenarios focused on business acumen.

Did you know? Only 11% of CEOs are confident that students are ready for the workforce.

Stay Ahead of Change

To compete today, organizations must tear down the notion of traditional learning and instead promote agility, idea flow and innovation. At Fullbridge, we believe smart learning is iterative and the influence of teams and social networks is very real. That’s why we built Lyra.

The Future of Learning

The Answer Is Lyra™

Lyra helps organizations build and align the capabilities of people, teams and networks for innovation and problem solving. To address the growing needs of corporate, law, and higher education, Lyra provides data-driven learning experiences, critical skills delivery, and assessment.

Lyra Technology

Our partners include

What people are saying

Our Fullbridge hire made an impact immediately. A lot of recent grads come out ingrained in school life, focused on working individually to get good grades. A mind-shift needs to occur to be successful in the workforce. His mindset was better prepared and had that shift coming in. He had self-awareness, awareness of others, and great teamwork.
—Manager, Strategy & Analysis, Digitas LBi
Fullbridge has become an essential part of our culture…Our success as a firm depends on how well we prepare our young attorneys for the challenges they will face in the real-world practice of law. Our clients expect us to bring more than legal skills to the table, and Fullbridge helps us achieve that.
—Bob Jewell, Managing Partner of Andrews Kurth Kenyon Law Firm
The Fullbridge program was a dynamic way to immerse ourselves in an office setting while being able to step back and analyze mistakes for improvement.
—Participant at College of the Holy Cross

Working Smarter Starts Here

Fullbridge makes it easy to build and maintain a learning culture. Contact us to learn how we can help you enhance team performance and achieve your organization’s goals. Stop falling behind.
